title: Meaning in Stele of Naram Sin

content.question: Identify the work shown. What was its intended meaning? Analyze how formal and symbolic elements are used in the work to communicate its intended meaning

frqParts.text: Identify the work shown. What was its intended meaning? Analyze how formal and symbolic elements are used in the work to communicate its intended meaning

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
